Posts.Content: Jul 14, 2012 11:57PM bhammer wrote: Did anyone start their Met journey with a local recurrence years post-Mx? My mastectomy w/Tram was in 2005 with Tamox. for 5 yrs. Now, I have a pea sized lump on the edge of recon. breast. Biopsy coming as soon as I can get a date. Curious about others which started this way....Thanks, Donna
